fields.eng_text:
What does DFO get out of this? Saves money, better programs, etc…

This field is only needed for trips requiring ADM approval.
fields.fra_text:
Qu'est-ce que le MPO en retire ? Des économies d'argent, de meilleurs programmes, etc.
Cette boîte n'est nécessaire que pour les déplacements nécessitant l'autorisation du SMA.

fields.eng_text: Leave blank if DFO
fields.fra_text: Laisser en blanc si le MPO

fields.eng_text: Please list all DFO and non-DFO costs related to this trip request. A cost can be entered in by rate or by a total amount.
This pertains to the actual travel, not the conference, meeting, etc.
fields.fra_text: Cela concerne le voyage proprement dit, et non la conférence ou la réunion, etc.

fields.eng_text: Select this box if this person should not be included in the travel plan that will be generated by this trip request.
You can use this section to attach any necessary files. A copy of the signed travel plan will also be attached when available.
Click on a traveller in the table below to edit their details and costs.
fields.fra_text: Cliquez sur un voyageur pour modifier ses coordonnées... NEEDS UPDATING

fields.eng_text:
It is very important to answer this question correctly because it will affect the approval process of anybody going to this event.

This is a placeholder for some elaborate text describing when ADM approval is needed.

(e.g. all international travel + conference attendances must be approved at the ADM level.)
fields.fra_text:
Il est très important de répondre correctement à cette question, car elle aura une incidence sur le processus d'approbation de toute personne qui se rendra à cet événement.

Il s'agit d'un support pour un texte élaboré décrivant les cas où l'approbation du SMA est nécessaire.

(p. ex. tous les déplacements internationaux + les participations à des conférences doivent être approuvés au niveau du SMA).

fields.eng_text: Are you classified as a Research Scientist

What is the total amount of non-DFO funding that is going toward this trip request?

The amount entered here will be subtracted from request's total costs in order to determine the portion of the travel covered by DFO vs. non-DFO.

Costs not covered by DFO must still be itemized in the request.
This field will not be included in the final travel plan. For internal use only.
fields.fra_text: Ce champ ne sera pas inclus dans le plan de voyage final. Pour usage interne seulement.

fields.eng_text: Brief description of what the event is about.  Not objective of the participants in going to the event.
fields.fra_text: Brève description de l'objet de l'événement.  Pas l'objectif des participants à l'événement.

fields.eng_text: The selection of DFO region will play a role in determining the review / approval  process order.
fields.fra_text: La sélection de la région du MPO jouera un rôle dans la détermination de l'ordre du processus d'examen et d'approbation.

fields.eng_text:
This section details the process order for reviews, recommendations and approval.

Please ensure that anybody added to this list is available to review your request immediately upon submissions (e.g. they are not away on leave).
training should be "other"...
This should be more expansive than just saying he/she “present a paper” for example.  This should describe how does his/her role at the event relate to his/her role at DFO.
fields.fra_text: Cela devrait être plus expansif que de simplement dire qu'il/elle " présente un article " par exemple.  Il devrait décrire comment son rôle lors de l'événement est lié à son rôle au MPO.

fields.eng_text: This is the DFO section for which expenditure initiation is being sought.
This pertains to the actual travel, not the conference, meeting, etc.
fields.fra_text: Cela concerne le voyage proprement dit, et non la conférence ou la réunion, etc.

fields.eng_text: This is simply a review of the trip details. There is no work to be done in this section.
Here are the details of your trip request. To edit the details, click on the "Edit" button in the toolbar at the top of the page.

If a user is selected, you will not have the option to manually enter a first name, last name or email address.

If the trip request is for a non-DFO employee, this field should be left blank. Otherwise a DM Apps user should be selected. If the name of the employee is not in the dropdown, please contact a system admin to have it added.
